front.title: Dynamic Resource Linking for Constrained RESTful Environments

abstract.t: This specification defines Link Bindings, which provide dynamic linking of state updates between resources, either on an endpoint or between endpoints, for systems using CoAP (RFC7252). This specification also defines Conditional Notification and Control Attributes that work with Link Bindings or with CoAP Observe (RFC7641).
The git repository for the draft is found at https://github.com/core- wg/dynlink
